name: Uncanny Dodge
description: When you are hit by an attack you can use a quick reaction to reduce the attack's damage by half.

name: Resistance
description: Resistance to a damage type. 1 type per level of this feat

name: Immunity
description: Immune to a damage type. 1 type per level of this feat

name: Weakness
description: Weakness to a damage type. 1 type per level of this feat

name: Pack Tactics
description: Gain +1 to hit target while you and an ally are within one space of a target creature. +1 Per level of this feat.

name: Flying
description: This creature can fly with a speed equal to half of your regular speed.

name: Flying II
description: This creature can fly with a speed equal to your regular speed.

name: Burrow
description: This creature can burrow with a speed equal to half of your regular speed.

name: Burrow II
description: This creature can burrow with a speed equal to your regular speed.

name: Darkvision
description: This creature can see in darkness up to 6 spaces as shades of grey.

name: Darkvision II
description: This creature can see in darkness up to 12 spaces as shades of grey.

name: Darkvision III
description: This creature can see in darkness up to 24 spaces as shades of grey.

name: Blindsense
description: Has Blindsense out to 3 spaces.

name: Blindsense II
description: Has Blindsense out to 6 spaces.

name: Blindsense III
description: Has Blindsense out to 12 spaces.

name: Blindsense IV
description: Has Blindsense out to 24 spaces.

name: Amphibious
description: This creature can breathe air and water.

name: Bounding
description: When an enemy comes within one space you, you may use a quick reaction to move up to half of your speed.

name: Jump
description: This creature can long jump 3 spaces and high jump 2.

name: Jump II
description: This creature can long jump 4 spaces and high jump 3.

name: Jump III
description: This creature can long jump 5 spaces and high jump 4.

name: Slow Walker
description: Ground Speed is 1/4 of your normal speed.

name: Regional Revival
description: If this creature dies in a specified region or realm it comes back to life somewhere within 10 kilometers of where it died in 1d10 days.

name: All-Surface Climber
description: This creature can climb on difficult vertical and horizontal surfaces, even upside down, without needing to make a Climb Roll.

name: Sun Sickness
description: When in sunlight this creature has -5 to all Rolls and Scores.

name: Sun Sickness II
description: When in sunlight this creature has -5 to all Rolls and Scores. This creature dies if it remains in the sun for one hour.

name: Telepathy
description: This creature can communicate telepathically with creatures it is aware of within 12 spaces.

name: Telepathy II
description: This creature can communicate telepathically with creatures it is aware of within 48 spaces.

name: Compression
description: This creature can move through spaces as small as 3 centimeters. Movement through these spaces requires no extra movement.

name: Waterbreathing
description: This creature can only breathe underwater.

name: Unflankable
description: This creature cannot be flanked.

name: Mimic
description: This creature can mimic any sound heard exactly, including voices, using Act against target's Discernment.

name: Water Movement
description: This creature ignores flanking when moving underwater. If this creature takes the movement action more than once in turn it can take it again as a free action.

name: Condition Immunity
description: This creature is immune to a condition. +1 condition per level of this feat.

name: Unrestrained Movement
description: This creature ignores difficult terrain, the slowed condition, and any other effect that would slow it's movement due to environmental effects.

name: Speedy
description: This creature's movement speed is increased by 2.

name: Speedy II
description: This creature's movement speed is increased by 4.

name: Speedy III
description: This creature's movement speed is increased by 6.

name: Slow
description: This creature's movement speed is decreased by 2.

name: Slow II
description: This creature's movement speed is decreased by 4.

name: Slow III
description: This creature's movement speed is decreased by 6.

name: Resources
description: This creature has 1.5x the normal currency for obtaining equipment or it's equivilent in natural weapons, armor, and equipment.

name: Resources II
description: This creature has 3x the normal currency for obtaining equipment or it's equivilent in natural weapons, armor, and equipment.

name: Hover
description: This creature must end it's turn within 1 space of the ground, but need not touch it. Only applicable if the creature has a flying speed. -1 per level of flying speed.

name: Telepathically Intune
description: This creature can perceive content of all telepathic communication within 12 spaces.

name: Hard to Stand Up
description: If this creature has the prone condition it must succeed on a Might roll DS 10 when it attempts to stand or remain prone. It can only attempt to stand from prone once each turn, and the movement to stand is spend whether it stands or not.

name: Undetectable
description: Powers with detection parts cannot target this creature.

name: Mute
description: This creature can understand known languages, but cannot speak them.

name: First Strike
description: This creature has +5 to initiative rolls.

name: Quick Hide
description: This creature can take the Hide action as a quick action.

name: Turns to Dust
description: When this creature dies it turns into dust, leaving behind all items it was wearing, carrying, or had eaten.

name: Beast of Burden
description: This creature counts as one size larger when determining carrying capacity.

name: Claws and Fangs
description: Spend an additional TP when learning Unarmed Prowess to add Weakened 1 to the creature's first Unarmed Prowess attack each turn.

name: Regenerative
description: Regain 5 Health at the start of each turn

name: Regenerative II
description: Regain 10 Health at the start of each turn

name: Regenerative III
description: Regain 15 Health at the start of each turn

name: Regenerative IV
description: Regain 20 Health at the start of each turn

name: Elemental Affinity
description: Add half of the creature's archetype proficiency to the damage of their attacks as a chosen elemental damage type.

name: Elemental Affinity II
description: Add the creature's archetype proficiency to the damage of their attacks as a chosen elemental damage type.

name: Elemental Affinity III
description: Add of the creature's archetype bonus to the damage of their attacks as a chosen elemental damage type.

name: Instinct
description: Add 3 to checks using Percieve with any physical sense; this also applies to Passive Percieve. The creature may ignore the effects of negative Acuity on Percieve.

name: Instinct II
description: Add 5 to checks using Percieve with any physical sense; this also applies to Passive Percieve. The creature may ignore the effects of negative Acuity on Percieve.

name: Jaws
description: On a critical strike with unarmed prowess or natural weapons, you have a 1/8 chance to break a bone.

name: Lycanthrope
description: Spend a quick action to transform into a special hybrid form for up to 10 rounds. While in this form, gain +1 to unarmed prowess or natural weapon damage.

name: Lycanthrope II
description: Same as Lycanthropy but additionally reduce 1 damage taken from all physical attacks from non-silvered weapons.

name: Lycanthrope III
description: Same as Lycanthropy II, but when you make an unarmed attack on your turn, you may spend a quick action to make another unarmed attack.

name: Fear Response
description: When this creature is bloodied, and when it enters terminal, it must make a DS 8  Resolve check or become frightened.

name: Mindless Rage
description: When this creature is bloodied, and when it enters terminal, it must make a DS 8 Mental Fortitude check or become unable to distinguish friend from foe.

name: Champion
description: This creature gains 5 Action Points at the start of combat and at the end of each turn. The Multiple Action Penalty for this creature is 4.

name: Champion II
description: This creature gains 6 Action Points at the start of combat and at the end of each turn. The Multiple Action Penalty for this creature is 3.

name: Champion III
description: This creature takes two turns during combat encounters. It rolls initiative for its first turn as normal. Its second turn occurs second-to-last in the combat round order.

name: Champion IV
description: This creature takes two turns during combat encounters. It rolls initiative for its first turn as normal. Its second turn occurs second-to-last in the combat round order. This creature gains 5 Action Points at the start of combat and at the end of each turn. The Multiple Action Penalty for the creature is 4.

name: Champion V
description: This creature takes two turns during combat encounters. It rolls initiative for its first turn as normal. Its second turn occurs second-to-last in the combat round order. This creature gains 6 Action Points at the start of combat and at the end of each turn. The Multiple Action Penalty for the creature is 3.

name: Champion VI
description: This creature takes three turns during combat encounters. It rolls initiative for its first turn as normal, and for it's second turn with a -5. Its third turn occurs second-to-last in the combat round order.

name: This creature can't Speak
description: This creature understands languages it knows, but cannot speak.

name: Returning Weapons
description: After using a specified thrown weapon (natural or not) the weapon returns to this creature's possesion on a hit or miss.

name: Power Resistant
description: This creature has a +1 bonus to overcome powers.

name: Power Resistant II
description: This creature has a +2 bonus to overcome powers.

name: Power Resistant III
description: This creature has a +3 bonus to overcome powers.

name: Grapple Attacks
description: When this creature hits with an attack it automatically grapples the target of the attack.

name: No Vision
description: This creature has no Basic Vision.

name: Teleport
description: Once per turn as a quick action this creature can teleport to a location within 6 spaces that it can see.

name: Teleport II
description: Once per turn as a quick action this creature can teleport to a location within 12 spaces that it can see.

name: Teleport III
description: As a quick action this creature can teleport to a location within 18 spaces that it can see.

name: Large Attacker
description: When this creature deals damage to a target smaller than it, that target takes an extra 1d6 damage for each size smaller.

name: Charger
description: When this creature deals damage to a target smaller than it after moving at least 4 spaces toward it, that target is also knocked prone.

name: Blood Rage
description: This creature gains a +2 bonus to hit while in Terminal.

name: Blood Rage II
description: This creature gains a +3 bonus to hit while in Terminal.

name: Blood Rage III
description: This creature gains a +4 bonus to hit while in Terminal.

name: Blood Rage IV
description: This creature gains a +5 bonus to hit while in Terminal.

name: Leaper
description: This creature can jump once per turn as a free action.

name: Constrictor
description: While grappled by this creature, targets take 1d6 Bludgeoning damage at the start of this creature's turn.

name: Constrictor II
description: While grappled by this creature, targets take 2d6 Bludgeoning damage at the start of this creature's turn.

name: Constrictor III
description: While grappled by this creature, targets take 3d8 Bludgeoning damage at the start of this creature's turn.

name: Constrictor IV
description: While grappled by this creature, targets take 3d12 Bludgeoning damage at the start of this creature's turn.

name: Tight Grapple
description: This creature's grapple score is determined by 12 + Strength.

name: Tight Grapple II
description: This creature's grapple score is determined by 14 + Strength.
